00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_OFFSET_H
00012 #define TT_OFFSET_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 
00017 
00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 class tt_offset:public tt_audio_base{
00025 
00026         private:
00027                 tt_attribute_value              offset_value;
00028                 
00029         public:
00030                 enum selectors{                                                         
00031                         k_offset_value,                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00032                 };
00033 
00034                 tt_offset(void)                                 // Constructor          
00035                 {
00036                         set_attr(k_offset_value, 0.0);
00037                 }
00038 
00039                 ~tt_offset(void)                                        // Destructor
00040                 {
00041                         ;
00042                 }
00043                 
00044                 
00045                 // ATTRIBUTES
00046                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00047                 {
00048                         switch (sel){                   
00049                                 case k_offset_value:
00050                                         offset_value = val;
00051                                         break;
00052                         }
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00056                 {
00057                         switch (sel){
00058                                 case k_offset_value:
00059                                         return offset_value;
00060                                 default:
00061                                         return 0.0;
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064                                 
00065                 
00066                 // DSP LOOP
00067                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00068                 {
00069                         temp_vs = in->vectorsize;
00070                         while(temp_vs--)
00071                                 *out->vector++ = *in->vector++ + offset_value;
00072                         in->reset(); out->reset();
00073                 }
00074 };
00075 
00076 #endif // TT_OFFSET_H
